job.title: MSP Network Engineer
job.description:
Description:
We are hiring within our MSP (Managed Services Provider) Infrastructure team. As a MSP Network Engineer, you will be responsible for following established network designs, configuring and deploying networking technologies, addressing network support issues, and performing network maintenance tasks for both Intermax Networks and our MSP clientele.
Roles and responsibilities
Install, configure and maintain IT infrastructure for MSP clients including firewalls, switches, and wireless access points
Network and Firewall administration supporting implementation of security policies and remediating conflicts
Coordination with system and application owners, schedule and apply rule changes, test and validate
Ensure system availability and reliability
Provide Level-2/3 support and troubleshooting to resolve issues
Working with third-party providers to keep the networks running efficiently
.
Requirements:
2+ years of experience in Routing and Network Engineering
Knowledge of infrastructure equipment and design to include firewalls, switches, Wireless Access Points and other networking technologies.
Ability to work well both individually and in a team
Proven hands-on experience
Excellent communication skills
WatchGuard and/or Ubiquiti product line experience a plus
Networking certifications such as WatchGuard, Cisco, Ubiquiti or CompTIA Network+ a plus.
